attributes.description:
17 APR 2020

*PARAMASHIVA'S MESSAGE DIRECTLY TO THE WORLD - KAILASA’S VIEW AND SUGGESTIONS FOR THE POST COVID19 WORLD.

*HINDU SOLUTIONS: FIRST THING, ALL HINDUS SHOULD UNDERSTAND: EVEN THOUGH WE ARE NOT THE REASON FOR THE PROBLEM, WE HINDUS SHOULD TAKE THE RESPONSIBILITY TO FIND SOLUTIONS, BECAUSE FROM THE TIME IMMEMORIAL, HINDUISM IS THE RELIGION, TRADITION, CONTINUOUSLY, IMMENSELY, CONTRIBUTING TO THE WORLD BY FINDING SOLUTIONS FOR EVERY CRISIS HUMANITY FACES. 

*HINDUISM IS THE RELIGION WHICH HAS SEEN AT LEAST 5 COMPLETE WIPING OUT OF PLANET EARTH, WIPING OUT OF CIVILISATION, AND WE HAVE THE KNOWLEDGE, RECORDED AND DOCUMENTED OF HOW WE REBUILT IT, EVERY TIME WHEN THE CIVILIZATION WAS WIPED OUT. ALL THE 18 PURANAS AND UPAPURANAS ARE COSMIC HISTORY, NOT MYTHOLOGY. AT LEAST 5 TIMES THE WHOLE CIVILIZATION WAS WIPED OUT ON PLANET EARTH AND WE HANDLED THE CRISIS. 

*WHEN THERE IS GLOBAL EMERGENCIES, THE KNOWLEDGE OF THE PAST IS TOO IMPORTANT; HOW HUMAN BEINGS HANDLED IT, WHAT ARE ALL THE METHODS THAT SUCCESSFULLY HELPED HUMAN BEINGS TO RECOVER FROM THE GLOBAL CRISIS. 

*FIRST THING: HINDUS NEED TO REALISE, YOU HAVE SOLUTIONS. PLEASE LOOK BACK AT YOUR HISTORY. STOP ABUSING THEM AS MYTHOLOGY BECAUSE ANTI-HINDUS HAVE ABUSED IT. WHETHER FROM BINARY LOGIC OR COSMIC LOGIC, HINDUS HAVE SOLUTIONS. 

*EVEN AS PER MODERN HISTORY, EVEN AS PER THE DATE AND TIME OF BINARY LOGIC RECORDING, HISTORICAL ARCHIVES, IT IS THE WELL ESTABLISHED FACT THAT HINDUISM IS THE OLDEST KNOWLEDGE-TRADITION STILL ALIVE, THE OLDEST LIVING CIVILIZATION WHICH HAS FACED LARGE CRISIS IN MULTIPLE LEVELS, WHETHER HEALTH-RELATED PANDEMICS OR NATURAL CALAMITIES. ALL THE GLOBAL CRISIS HUMAN BEINGS FACED, WE HAVE THE CLEAR KNOWLEDGE, CLEAR MANUAL - HOW WE HANDLED IT. 

*MANU, COLLECTING ALL THE SPECIES AND KEEPING THEM IN A LARGE SHIP AND AFTER THE WORLD'S GREATEST DELUGE, PARKING THE SHIP IN THE AVAILABLE LAND AND RESTARTING THE CIVILIZATION, IS HISTORY, NOT MYTHOLOGY. THE LARGE SHARK WHICH PULLED THE SHIP, THAT SHARK REMAINS AS THE FLAG SYMBOL OF THE PANDYA KINGDOM! 

*MANU’S LARGE SHIP LANDED NEAR KANYAKUMARI. MANU HAS ONE SON AND ONE DAUGHTER. THE DAUGHTER WAS GIVEN IN THE AREA CALLED KUMARI KANDAM.THAT IS WHY IT IS CALLED KANYAKUMARI AND IT IS THE LAND CONNECTED TO BHARATA VARSHA. HIS SON’S NAME WAS ELAM. THAT IS WHY SRI LANKA HAS THE NAME ELAM. IT IS ALL HISTORICAL FACTS, NOT MYTHOLOGICAL STORIES.

*HINDUS NEED TO KNOW, WE JUST NEED TO REVISIT PURANAS WITH THE CLARITY THAT THEY ARE HISTORY DOCUMENTS, NOT MYTHOLOGY. 

*YESTERDAY I WAS EXPLAINING A FEW POINTS. WE NEED TO CONTEMPLATE ON THE COSMIC LOGIC - WHY ARE WE GOING THROUGH WHAT WE ARE GOING THROUGH? 

*YESTERDAY I SAID, COSMIC LOGIC ONLY WE CALL AS KARMA. COSMIC SOLUTIONS, WE CALL AS DHARMA.

*WHAT IS THE KARMA, CAUSE FOR COVID19 CORONA VIRUS? I CAN SAY MULTIPLE REASONS. LET US INTRANALISE ONE BY ONE - THE KARMA, CAUSE OF THIS PROBLEM, AND THE DHARMA - SOLUTION FOR THIS PROBLEM. 

*I WILL MAKE CLEAR REVELATIONS - HINDU SOLUTIONS - KARMA THAT CAUSED THE PROBLEMS OF COVID19 AND ALL THE OTHER RELATED PROBLEMS OF COVID19 AND DHARMA - COSMIC SOLUTIONS FOR THESE PROBLEMS.

*HINDUISM TEACHES CONSTANTLY THAT YOU SHOULD LOOK AT THE ROOT OF THE PROBLEM, SOURCE OF THE PROBLEM, WITHOUT GETTING OVERWHELMED AND TRYING TO FIND STOPGAP OR SUPERFICIAL SOLUTIONS. 

*EVEN IF THE PROBLEM IS OVERWHELMING, DO NOT GO FOR STOPGAP OR SUPERFICIAL SOLUTIONS. GO INTO THE ROOT OF THE PROBLEM. LOOK INTO THE ROOT OF THE PROBLEM, FIND THE RIGHT PERMANENT, ULTIMATE, COMPLETE SOLUTION. 

*THINKING THE PERMANENT SOLUTION IS TIME-TAKING PROCESS, IS DELUSION. PEOPLE WHO WANT TO FORCE STOPGAP, HALFBAKED, VESTED INTEREST, SUPERFICIAL SOLUTIONS ON YOU ARE MAKING YOU BELIEVE YOU NEED TO ACCEPT THE STOPGAP, SUPERFICIAL, SOLUTIONS FOR IMMEDIATE PURPOSE. 

*SURELY WE NEED TO PROTECT OURSELVES IMMEDIATELY, QUARANTINING SHOULD BE FOLLOWED, BUT YOU NEED TO KNOW, ALL THAT IS NOT PERMANENT SOLUTION. 

*PRECAUTIONARY METHODS CANNOT BE PROMOTED AS SOLUTIONS. UNDERSTAND THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THESE TWO. QUARANTINE IS A GREAT PRECAUTIONARY METHOD. I STRONGLY RECOMMEND, ALL OF YOU FOLLOW THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT’S LOCAL GUIDELINES, RECOMMENDATIONS AND ORDERS VERY STRICTLY AND SINCERELY. BUT YOU NEED TO UNDERSTAND THESE ARE PREVENTION, NOT SOLUTION.





/level2
